lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The freeze, which Finance Minister Bernard Chidzero said would check production costs and reduce the budget deficit, has been partly welcomed by business but criticised by workers whose real purchasing power has been severely eroded since 1980.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The government announced the freeze amid a worsening economic crisis caused by serious drought, a budget deficit of more than one billion Zimbabwean dlrs and an acute balance of payments problem owing to debt service costs, now 357 mln U.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The crisis has forced the country to make companies halve dividend remittances to overseas shareholders.
